definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

pinyin: jian3 yi4 zha4 dan4 zhuang1 zhi4

sentences.english: Home electric kitchen utensils made by our factory are easy to use and maintain.
sentences.chinese: 本厂的家用厨房电器，使用方便，维修简易。

sentences.english: Has these four types, then got in the simple tea-oil tree.
sentences.chinese: 有这四样，即可打简易油茶了。

sentences.english: The bus sometimes stops at a drive-in.
sentences.chinese: 有时候这巴士停留在简易餐馆。

sentences.english: A simplified wet desulphurization method is tested through a desulphurization model for wet precipitators, which is established based on calculation of flue gas parameters.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了通过模拟试验进行的湿式简易脱硫方法。

sentences.english: The criminal summary procedure is the result of the coordination between the fairness and the efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 刑事简易程序是公正与效率协调的产物。

sentences.english: Presents an easy testing method on phase sequence of TXSGA phase switcher.
sentences.chinese: 提出了检验TXSGA型移相器相序的一种简易方法。

sentences.english: The study of a simple PID control based on engineering tuning methods is conducted in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于工程整定法的简易PID控制算法。

sentences.english: In 2002, Gong created a simple web space.
sentences.chinese: 2002年时，龚创建了一个简易的网站。

sentences.english: However, to becoming a bad citizen is not an easy thing.
sentences.chinese: 然而，做一个好良民否则一件简易的事件。

sentences.english: The key to simple goal setting is to not have too many goals.
sentences.chinese: 简易目标管理的关键是不要设定太多的目标。

sentences.english: Used C language to develop simple compiler.
sentences.chinese: 用C语言开发简易编译系统。

sentences.english: It has been realized that this way is facility and practicality by practiced, and it can get bett…
sentences.chinese: 实践证明此法简易实用，能取得较好的监控效果。

sentences.english: They fixed up a simple operation table at one end of the room.
sentences.chinese: 他们在房间一头搭了一张简易手术台。

sentences.english: Introduce the development on a single use device for autologous blood transfusion.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了简易一次性自体血回输装置的研制。

sentences.english: Quick and simple anchor fastening design.
sentences.chinese: 喜利得快速简易锚栓设计程序。

sentences.english: A very easy measurement of the kingpin caster angle is been put forward.
sentences.chinese: 并由此提出一个简易的主销后倾角测量方法。

definition: to draw on local resources/using materials at hand
